newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portuguese bonds steady, low spreads vs Bunds.
newsitem.headline: Portuguese bonds steady, low spreads vs Bunds.

text.p: Portuguese bond futures edged higher and cash remained steady as yield spreads against 10-year Bunds held at record low levels of around 50 basis points, dealers said.

Dealers said they expected the Bank of Portugal to leave rates unchanged at the start of a new commercial bank reserve accounting period at 1315 GMT. Earlier, the Bank of Spain left its key rates unchanged.
"Futures recovered with Bunds and the cash market is calm, with spreads against Bunds holding at 50 bp," said one dealer.
